participant_1.background:
I spend my free time tinkering with new cellphone app ideas.
i enjoy listening to country music.
I am frugal and creative with my wardrobe.
i work as an interior designer.
I enjoy my tea while I am working on my goals, and it helps me stay focused and productive.

participant_2.background:
I'm not good at keeping up with my family, but I always stay in touch with my dog.
I don't have time to dye my hair.
I will teach my children to appreciate good music and be tolerant of others' tastes.
i am still single at the age of 35.
My rap playlist is my favorite because it reminds me of the struggles I faced and how far I've come.

content.text: I've been working on a new app idea for a cellphone app. I'm thinking it will be a music app that allows you to listen to your favorite music and create playlists.
That's a great idea! I love listening to music. I have a whole playlist of my favorite country songs.
I love country music too! I'm not too good at keeping up with my family, but I always stay in touch with my dog.
I'm not very good at keeping up with my family either. I'm still single at the age of 35. But I love my dog!
I'm glad you have a furry friend to keep you company. I'm working as an interior designer. I love helping people create beautiful spaces.
That's such a great job! I love decorating my home. I have a really eclectic style.
I love eclectic styles! I'm frugal and creative with my wardrobe. I love finding unique pieces that don't break the bank.
That's a great way to shop! I'm not very good at being frugal. I love buying new things.
It's all about finding the balance between what you love and what you can afford.
I agree! I'm glad you're enjoying your new job. I'm still looking for my dream job.
